summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3185 for the improvement of Maiden Lane, from the north line of Denny-Blaine Lake Park Addition to a point about ninety (90) feet northerly therefrom; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 39224, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
